name: CargoX d.o.o.
goal: We are a technological company developing shipping solution on a block-chain technology. We are one of the first in the world having a MVP for transfer of B/L document (B/L is a high-valuable document). Our intention is to present the technology to the EC and present how modern technology can solve problems in shipping industry.
euInitiatives: Following the digitalisation and shipping agenda. As a global company we are following all policies and legislation in every single country in the world (ranked by importance of implementation of our product)
